analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#523-524) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#609-629)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#697-714)
	- generateTokens (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#745-756)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#763-773)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#830-837) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#640-657):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#652-655)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#655-656)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#349-351) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#351)

EmaCrowdSale.tranferPresaleTokens (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#407-413) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(this,investor,ammount) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#413)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#859-870) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#868-869)

Configurator.deploy (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.generateTokens(crowdsale,255000000000000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol)
	-token.generateTokens(incetivesPool,115000000000000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol)
	-token.generateTokens(FoundersAndTeam,85000000000000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol)
	-token.generateTokens(FuturePartners,40000000000000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol)
	-token.generateTokens(BountiesWal,5000000000000000000000000) (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol)

EmaCrowdSale.constructor.wallet (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#398) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.wallet (state variable @ /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#239-240)

EmaCrowdSale.constructor.token (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#398-401) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (state variable @ /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#233-234)

EmaCrowdSale.constructor.startTime (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#401) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.startTime (state variable @ /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#244)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#800) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#839-840)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#830-837)
	- /unique_contracts/0xc3ee57fa8ed253e3f214048879977265967ae745.sol#833-837
